QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when rotation_rules is null then 'alarm'
    else 'ok'
  end as status,
  case
    when rotation_rules is null then title || ' automatic rotation not enabled.'
    else title || ' automatic rotation enabled.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_secretsmanager_secret;
